executionArgs.additionalInstruction:
Focus on the following critical debug areas:
1. Authentication: Test for race conditions when the first user signs up (ensure they become super_admin). Verify RLS blocks 'pending' users from accessing dashboard data.
2. Group Management: Verify 'add_owner_to_group' trigger works (owner must be a member). Test unique invite code constraints. Verify RLS prevents non-members from viewing private group posts.
3. Workout Logging: Test data integrity for specific workout types (e.g., swolf only for swimming). Verify storage upload policies (authenticated only).
4. Admin Features: specific tests for admin RLS policies (ensure only admins can see specific data). Test approval status updates take immediate effect.
